code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./SelectorStyles.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConnectionSelector=_ref=>{let{selectedConnection,onConnectionTypeChange}=_ref;const connections=['平接','跳接_按行1/4','跳接_按行1/3','跳接_按行1/2','跳接_按行2/3','跳接_按行3/4'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{className:"selector",value:selectedConnection,onChange:e=>onConnectionTypeChange(e.target.value),children:connections.map((connection,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:connection,children:connection},index))});};export default ConnectionSelector;
